items.title: Salveaza fisierul, dar nu iesi
items.subtitle: Iesire ⎯  :w
items.match: write  the file, but don't exit Iesire :w

items.title: Salveaza fisierul folosind sudo
items.subtitle: Iesire ⎯  :w !sudo tee %
items.match: write out the current file using sudo Iesire :w !sudo tee %

items.title: Salveaza fisierul si iesi din program
items.subtitle: Iesire ⎯  :wq or :x or ZZ
items.match: write  and quit Iesire :wq or :x or ZZ

items.title: Iesi din program
items.subtitle: Iesire ⎯  :q
items.match: quit  Iesire :q

items.title: Iesi si sterge modificarile din fisier
items.subtitle: Iesire ⎯  :q! or ZQ
items.match: quit and throw away unsaved changes Iesire :q! or ZQ

items.title: Exiting.commands.colonwqa
items.subtitle: Iesire ⎯  :wqa
items.match: write  and quit on all tabs Iesire :wqa

items.title: Cauta dupa sablon
items.subtitle: Cauta si inlocuieste ⎯  /pattern
items.match: search for pattern Cauta si inlocuieste /pattern

items.title: Cauta inapoi dupa sablon
items.subtitle: Cauta si inlocuieste ⎯  ?pattern
items.match: search backward for pattern Cauta si inlocuieste ?pattern

items.title: Sablon 'foarte magic': caracterele non-alfanumerice sunt interpretate ca symboluri regex
items.subtitle: Cauta si inlocuieste ⎯  \vpattern
items.match: 'very magic' pattern: non-alphanumeric characters are interpreted as special regex symbols  Cauta si inlocuieste \vpattern

items.title: Repeta cautarea inainte
items.subtitle: Cauta si inlocuieste ⎯  n
items.match: repeat search in same direction Cauta si inlocuieste n

items.title: Repeta cautarea inapoi
items.subtitle: Cauta si inlocuieste ⎯  N
items.match: repeat search in opposite direction Cauta si inlocuieste N

items.title: Inlocuieste peste tot old cu new in fisier
items.subtitle: Cauta si inlocuieste ⎯  :%s/old/new/g
items.match: replace all old with new throughout file Cauta si inlocuieste :%s/old/new/g

items.title: Inlocuieste peste tot old cu new in fisier cu confirmare
items.subtitle: Cauta si inlocuieste ⎯  :%s/old/new/gc
items.match: replace all old with new throughout file with confirmations Cauta si inlocuieste :%s/old/new/gc

items.title: Sterge highlightul cuvintelor potrivite
items.subtitle: Cauta si inlocuieste ⎯  :noh[lsearch]
items.match: remove highlighting of search matches Cauta si inlocuieste :noh[lsearch]

items.title: Next whole word under cursor
items.subtitle: Cauta si inlocuieste ⎯  *
items.match: Next whole word under cursor Cauta si inlocuieste *

items.title: Previous whole word under cursor
items.subtitle: Cauta si inlocuieste ⎯  #
items.match: Previous whole word under cursor Cauta si inlocuieste #

items.title: Cauta dupa sablon in fisiere multiple

items.match: search for pattern in multiple files Cauta in fisiere multiple :vim[grep] /pattern/ file

items.title: Sari la urmatoarea potrivire
items.subtitle: Cauta in fisiere multiple ⎯  :cn[ext]
items.match: jump to the next match Cauta in fisiere multiple :cn[ext]

items.title: Sari la potrivirea anterioara
items.subtitle: Cauta in fisiere multiple ⎯  :cp[revious]
items.match: jump to the previous match Cauta in fisiere multiple :cp[revious]

items.title: Deschide o fereastra care contine lista de potriviri
items.subtitle: Cauta in fisiere multiple ⎯  :cope[n]
items.match: open a window containing the list of matches Cauta in fisiere multiple :cope[n]

items.title: Close the quickfix window
items.subtitle: Cauta in fisiere multiple ⎯  :ccl[ose]
items.match: close the quickfix window Cauta in fisiere multiple :ccl[ose]

items.match: Cauta in fisiere multiple colonWa

items.title: Close the quickfix window
items.subtitle: Cauta in fisiere multiple ⎯  :ccl[ose]
items.match: close the quickfix window Cauta in fisiere multiple :ccl[ose]

items.title: Deschide fisierul intr-un tab nou
items.subtitle: Taburi ⎯  :tabnew or :tabnew file
items.match: open a file in a new tab Taburi :tabnew or :tabnew file

items.title: Muta fereastra curenta in propriul tab
items.subtitle: Taburi ⎯  Ctrl+wT
items.match: move the current split window into its own tab Taburi Ctrl+wT

items.title: Dute la urmatorul tab
items.subtitle: Taburi ⎯  gt or :tabn[ext]
items.match: move to the next tab Taburi gt or :tabn[ext]

items.title: Dute la tabul anterior
items.subtitle: Taburi ⎯  gT or :tabp[revious]
items.match: move to the previous tab Taburi gT or :tabp[revious]

items.title: Dute la tabul cu numarul #
items.subtitle: Taburi ⎯  #gt
items.match: move to tab number # Taburi #gt

items.title: Dute la tabul din pozitia #
items.subtitle: Taburi ⎯  :tabm[ove]
items.match: move current tab to the #th position  Taburi :tabm[ove]

items.title: Inchide tabul curent si toate ferestrele lui
items.subtitle: Taburi ⎯  :tabc[lose]
items.match: close the current tab and all its windows Taburi :tabc[lose]

items.title: Inchide toate taburile in afara de cel curent
items.subtitle: Taburi ⎯  :tabo[nly]
items.match: close all tabs except for the current one Taburi :tabo[nly]

items.title: Ruleaza comanda in toate taburile
items.subtitle: Taburi ⎯  :tabdo command
items.match: run the command on all tabs  Taburi :tabdo command

items.match: go to the previous buffer Editarea fisierelor multiple :bp[revious]
